definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: In this paper, the definition of reductio ad absurdum, logical principles and problem-solving steps.
sentences.chinese: 本文简述了反证法的定义，逻辑原理和解题步骤。

sentences.english: Mathematics can be said to be required to build on the achievements is indelible.
sentences.chinese: 可以说反证法为数学所建立的功勋是不可磨灭的。

sentences.english: He would not believe even with the disproof before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 即使反证摆在眼前，他仍不相信。

sentences.english: Then treat with the prescription of "regulating and nourishing the lung and kidney" to prove the reliability of the model.
sentences.chinese: 用调补肺肾方进行治疗有效，反证模型的可靠性。

sentences.english: He could not believe even with the disproof before his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 反证摆在眼前，他仍不能相信。

sentences.english: Then treat with the prescription of "regulating and nourishing the lung and kidney" to pro…
sentences.chinese: 用调补肺肾方进行治疗有效，反证模型的可靠性。

sentences.english: Well in this specific case I am going to disprove your assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在这样特殊的情况下，我打算对你的假设提出反证。

definition: proof/certificate/identification/testimonial/CL:個|个[ge4]/to prove/to testify/to confirm the truth of
reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
circular argument/logical error consisting of begging the question/Latin: petitio principii
unacceptable as uncorroborated evidence (in law or in textual criticism)
